reviews.text: 2761 N Hwy 77 Suite 120, Waxahachie, TX 75165 “We had MINT Exteriors replace our roof after a bad spring wind storm. They worked with us, along with our insurance company to make the process less stressful. I would especially recommend Nate Odom, our salesperson. Nate was always very responsive and professional throughout the whole process. I would recommend MINT for shingle replacement on your home, great local company who takes pride in their business.” – Eric Dawson You're seeing a limited vi
